message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite a bit below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I've given this some thought and am willing to go up to $13,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
